description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for handling PriceSnapshot entities, including methods to find recent snapshots and filter by product, retailer, and timestamp range.

classes.name: PriceSnapshotRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for PriceSnapshot entities, extending JpaRepository with custom query methods for fetching recent and filtered price snapshots.

methods.name: findTop10ByProductOrderByTimestampDesc
methods.description: Fetches the top 10 most recent PriceSnapshot entries for a given product.

methods.name: findByProductAndRetailerAndTimestampBetween
methods.description: Fetches PriceSnapshot entries for a specific product and retailer within a specified time range.
